titles.title: FHA Property Inspection Act

To amend section 203 of the National Housing Act to require properties that are subject to mortgages insured under the FHA single family housing mortgage insurance program to be inspected and determined to comply with the minimum property standards established by the Secretary of Housing and Urban Development.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Banking and Financial Services.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Housing and Community Opportunity.

committee.name: House Committee on Banking and Financial Services

bill.summary: 4/29/1998--Introduced. FHA Property Inspection Act - Amends the National Housing Act to require that properties undergo a compliance inspection by a certified building inspector in order to qualify for single family housing mortgage insurance. Directs the Secretary of Housing and Urban Development to establish inspector certification standards.
